attributes.action: Increasing funding for the Sandyford in Glasgow
attributes.background: Lack of funding for the Gender Identity Clinic, the Sandyford has caused waiting list times to spiral out of control- with people waiting at least 9 months for an appointment- and is still increasing drastically. There needs to be more funding to train more psychiatrists and councilors.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about health services in Scotland, which are the responsibility of the Scottish Government. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more: 

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
